snippet.title: GRIME | Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
ESRB Rated: TEEN for Animated Blood, Fantasy Violence
Coming August 2nd to PC!

Crush your foes with living weapons and consume their essence with your sentient black hole! GRIME is a fast and unforgiving soulslike metroidvania coming soon to PC Platforms. Brandish the living weapons to dominate your enemies on August 2nd!

To learn more about GRIME, Clover Bite, or Akupara Games, visit:
►GRIME: https://linktr.ee/playgrime
►Clover Bite: https://www.grimegame.com/​
►Akupara Games: http://linktr.ee/akuparagames
